Speedster [i](If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4)[/i]
Max Speed — Whenever Cobalt Blue attacks, return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile it at the end of combat.

Haste
Speedster [i](If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4)[/i]
Max Speed — {2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Speedster
Max Speed — {3}{B}: Choose a creature you own from outside the game and put it onto the battlefield. That creature gains hate. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

Speedster [i](If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4)[/i]
When Savitar enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until Savitar leaves the battlefield.
Max Speed — {0}: Return the exiled card to its owner's graveyard.

Max speed — Whenever Godspeed attacks, create two copies of Godspeed tapped and attacking.

cards.card_name: Red Death, Dark Knight of Speed
cards.rules_text:
Speedster [i](If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4)[/i]
When Red Death enters, create a 2/2 black Armor artifact creature token with haste and “Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has haste. Reconfigure {2}{B}.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I am vengeance. I am the night. I am the Red Death”[/i]
[i]“This is how my life is supposed to be! For years, I felt like something was missing. And now I know why”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Speedster [i](If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4)[/i]
Max Speed — If a creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile that card and each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Choose one. If you have max speed, you may choose both instead.
 — Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
 — Draw two cards and lose 2 life.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“What was once my prison shall now be yours”[/i]

cards.card_name: Recover in the Negative Speed Force
cards.rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.”
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Don't you get it. You can't kill a God!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: This deck is full of small haste units and Speedsters. Hit your opponent early to max out your speed so you can keep up in the mid game.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]This deck uses your third unchosen Jumpstart deck.
Designed by David Keane[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
Reconfigure {2}{B} [i]({2}{B}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)[/i]
